title: Ennara and the Fallen Druid
description: When a mysterious curse threatens to transform everyone into shadowy demons, a magical eleven year-old girl must travel to a sunken city ruin—fighting pirates, monsters, and an undead sorcerer along the way—to find a weapon that can save her world.Please note that this story contains some dark elements. Recommended for ages 11 and above. Reviews greatly appreciated!
author: Angela Shelley
